import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Bin from "../../multimedia/png/bin.png" import { deleteData } from "../../Services/CRUD" const ProductCard = ({data}) => { const handleDelete = async (id) => { await deleteData("products", id) } return (

{data.name}

{data.size}

${data.price}

) } export default ProductCard
